If I’m not on my computer, you can usually find me in the next hipster café or in the nature.

Flat-Search

2018 - today

A start-up I co-founded that enables users to search for flats and rooms in the Czech Repbulic, primarly targeting expats. I am responsible for the UX/ UI design, the front- end development in React and the marketing. The website is still under construction.
